function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Cumulative investment decline in germany and france due to coronavirus spread","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference of growth firms by equity funds and value investing by fixed income may lead to concentration of investment in specific sectors, increasing the risk of contagion within those sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Worsening market conditions impacting fund performance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative risk-adjusted returns in phase 3 for treasury funds","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition from positive to negative performance for equity funds in phases 2 and 3","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible contagion of diseases due to close contact in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on health and well-being due to close contact in investment locations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through shared spaces and surfaces in investment locations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of sharpe ratio sensitive to market movements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on var-based models without considering non-normality","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitivity of returns to different asset classes and investment strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial market impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown measures in eu member states","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of covid-19 within the eu due to investment fund activities and interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for public health risk in investment decision making","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of social responsibility in investment strategies during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggered overall response and financial speculation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on diverse range of funds in europe","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining yields on treasury instruments due to extreme pressure on public finances from covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in fund returns reflecting the impact of systemic shocks like covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider viral epidemics as a significant risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scant evidence on economic and social impact of epidemics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global financial system volatility due to contagious epidemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of technical language without context","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases among the 150,000 people detected in the oxford town centre due to close proximity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with viewpoint-independent human classification algorithm that may lead to overlooking potential health risks and disease transmission patterns","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public sharing of materials and sample videos may lead to misuse of technology for covert surveillance or unethical monitoring practices","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and computer vision technology for social distancing monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Availability of data in github repository","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of human detector model for monitoring public spaces","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulating approach to highlighting risky zones in covered areas with poor ventilation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate risk assessment due to varying contamination trends in different areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate long-term monitoring of crowd behavior and contamination trends","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased density of contamination in covered places with minimal ventilation due to static people","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of high traffic areas showing stronger contamination heatmaps","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of social distancing violations leading to high-risk categories of individuals","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and tracking of individual movement data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of high-risk zones and creation of risk heat-map","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identifying couples based on proximity and time could lead to inaccurate assumptions about their actual relationship, potentially missing true social contacts or interactions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of proximity-based social distancing measures may result in privacy concerns and resistance from individuals.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for identifying social distancing violations may lead to errors in detection and interpretation of human behaviors.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on social distancing guidelines for family members and couples","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of inter-people distance due to controversial opinions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrecognized social distancing violations in risky zones","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of people with partial visibility or truncated objects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in extreme lighting conditions and lens distortion effects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing violation due to inaccurate distance measurements","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mass deployment of the system in large shopping malls","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of real-time performance hardware with low accuracy in social distancing monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure of social distancing monitoring models with low speed","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
